title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: We are pleased to offer reliable and high quality offshore dedicated servers with a choice of 15 offshore locations including Bulgaria, Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland, South Africa, Malaysia, Vietnam, Korea, Singapore, Dubai, Taiwan, and Thailand.We do have three pre configured servers available for each location, however if you do need a custom quote you can ask for that from our sales department, and we will make a custom configuration quote for you according to your needs and the location that you will choose.All offshore dedicated servers are fully dedicated servers, means no hardware is shared, and you will get the full power and security of the dedicated hardware.Special offshore streaming servers are available with 10gbps full duplex uplink, and servers with NVIDIA RTX A4000 GPU are available as well.We are offshore servers provider and give high importance to the client privacy and keep our clients data private, and you can also use BTC and other crypto currencies to pay privately too.You can visit our pre configured servers here: https://www.zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpAll servers come with 100% uptime guarantee, fully redundant N+1 network, 24/7/365 customer support.
